weekOf: February 12th to February 19th (Not live until ~5am EDT on February 12th)
introMessages: This week marks the release of the Grotti Itali Classic, now available to purchase from Legendary Motorsport.

Valentine’s Day celebrations in GTA Online this week include Triple Rewards on Deadline Duet, 4X GTA$ on Associate and Bodyguard Salaries, and boosted chances of finding the Pink Diamond in El Rubio’s compound during the Cayo Perico Heist.

We’re also celebrating the Year of the Fire Horse with a new Lunar New Year Stunt Race: The Senora Derby, as well as 3X GTA$ and RP on all Lunar New Year Stunt Races. Plus, the return of Yuanbao Collectibles, free Horse Tattoos and Masks, and more.
prizeRideChallenge: Place Top 2 in the LS Car Meet Series
weeklyChallenge: Earn GTA$100,000 as an Associate or Bodyguard to receive the Valentines Blazer and GTA$100,000
